title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

Along with the provisions of Part 452.2 of this Title, for the purposes of this Part, the following definitions apply as it pertains
to safe homes: (a) Safe home provider
means a person who has been approved by a safe home network to provide
temporary shelter in his/her residence to victims of domestic
violence. (b) Safe home provider
family or household member means each person who is currently residing in the
home of the prospective or approved safe home provider. Notes

454.2

York State Register April 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 13, eff. 4/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
